from multiprocessing import Process, Value, Array
	def f(n, a):
		n.value = 3.1415927
		for i in range(len(a)):
			a[i] = -a[i]
	if __name__ == '__main__':
		num = Value('d', 0.0)
		arr = Array('i', range(10))
		p = Process(target=f, args=(num, arr))
		p.start()
		p.join()
		print num.value
		print arr[:]
